  • Select appropriate sanitizers and disinfectants.

    Select appropriate sanitizers and disinfectants. This information can be found at the Appendix J link at the end of this section.

  • Establish a routine schedule for cleaning, sanitizing, and disinfecting

    It is important to establish a routine schedule for cleaning, sanitizing and disinfecting. The form found in Appendix K offers an excellent means for documenting and monitoring your cleaning schedule. The link to this is at the end of this section.

  • Use the appropriate method for cleaning up body fluids

    Always follow OSHA (Occupational Safety & Health Administration) Guidelines to ensure proper cleaning up of body fluids. All of this information can be found in the link to Appendix L. (also in the Support Material at the end of this section)
